Executive Summary

Keysight Technologies empowers innovators to design and deliver next-generation solutions with precision, speed, and confidence.

Moolya proposes a DevOps Implementation and Managed Operations solution to strengthen Keysight’s software delivery ecosystem through a self-managed Kubernetes platform on AWS, integrated with your existing toolchain Jenkins, Polaris, Black Duck, and Vault.

This initiative will:

• Accelerate deployment cycles through automated CI/CD and secure pipelines.
• Enhance governance and compliance via Polaris and Black Duck integration.
• Ensure continuous reliability with Vault-based secrets, ACM certificates, and AWS observability.

Together, we’ll enable Keysight to deliver faster, operate securely, and scale seamlessly, supporting your vision of engineering excellence.

Engagement Objectives

Drive continuous improvement and governance through measurable KPIs.

Implement and manage Kubernetes-based DevOps platform on AWS.

Integrate Jenkins pipelines with Polaris and Black Duck for compliance enforcement.

Automate certificate and secret lifecycle via Vault + AWS ACM.

Establish observability using Prometheus,Grafana,CloudWatch.

Provide executive visibility through reports, dashboards, and audits.

Case Study 1

Leading eCommerce Enterprise -DevOps Modernization and Continuous Delivery Excellence

About

• A
• leading global e-commerce platform serving millions of daily active users with peak-scale traffic during major shopping events.
• •
• The engagement involved establishing a scalable, self-managed Kubernetes platform on AWS while maintaining full control of live workloads.

DevOps Value Delivered

• •
• Took full DevOps ownership from Day l while implementing a self-managed Kubernetes platform on AWS EC2 using Terraform with zero downtime.
• •
• Re-engineered Jenkins pipelines with automated build-test-deploy flow, integrated SonarQube for quality gates, and improved release reliability.
• •
• Embedded OWASP Dependency-Check for open-source risk validation and baseline vulnerability scoring across all builds.
• •
• Implemented HashiCorp Vault and AWS Certificate Manager (ACM) for dynamic secrets rotation and automated SSL renewals.

Business Impact

• •
• SonarQube integration lowered high-severity issues by 70% and improved maintainability across key services.
• •
• Terraform automation and AWS resource optimization reduced infrastructure costs by -22%
• •
• OWASP Dependency-Check, Vault. and governance dashboards ensured continuous compliance and transparent reporting.

Case Study 2

Leading Supply Chain Management Platform

About the Platform

A supply chain and sustainability management platform designed for fashion brands across the European Union (EU), empowering them to manage operations and compliance efficiently using AWS.

DevOps Transformation

• •
• Streamlined CI/CD Pipelines: Implemented end-to-end continuous integration and deployment pipelines using Cloudbees to ensure faster, automated, and error-free releases.
• •
• Containerization & Infrastructure as Code (laC): Migrated services to containerized environments and adopted laC (Terraform + Kubernetes) for scalable and consistent infrastructure management.
• •
• Automated Monitoring & Alerts: Set up real-time monitoring, logging, and alerting systems using Prometheus and Grafana to improve observability and system reliability,
• •
• Environment Standardization: Unified staging, QA, and production environments to eliminate configuration drift and reduce deployment risks.

Business Impact

• •
• Operational Agility: Enhanced platform reliability and enabled faster, more predictable releases.
• •
• Cost Optimization: Reduced infrastructure overhead through automated scaling and resource utilization monitoring.

Case Study 3

Kubernetes-driven Delivery Transformation UsingAWS

About the Platform

Enterprise SaaS client operating legacy EC2 deployments with manual release cycles and inconsistent configuration.

Moolya's Role:

• •
• Designed AWS multi-account strategy with centralized IAM and GuardDuty.
• •
• Containerized 40+ microservices and deployed to EKS clusters.
• •
• Implemented Terraform modules for provisioning. networking. and IAM roles.
• •
• Established Grafana dashboards for SLO tracking.

Results:

• •
• Deployment frequency increased from bi-weekly to daily.
• •
• Infrastructure drift reduced to near zero with laC adoption.
• •
• 35% cost optimization through right-sized autoscaling.
• •
• Security exposure window reduced by 60% via automated scans.

Conclusion

Moolya’s DevOps Implementation and Managed Operations program establishes a secure, compliant, and fully automated DevOps ecosystem on AWS powered by Kubernetes, Jenkins, Polaris, and Black Duck.

Our deliverables provide not just automation, but visibility, governance, and confidence ensuring your infrastructure and pipelines remain continuously optimized, secure, and aligned with enterprise expectations.

This is not a one-time setup it’s a sustained evolution of your DevOps maturity model, backed by transparent reporting and measurable results.

Thank You!
